ModMetaData.name: Rim of Madness - Bones Enchantment
ModMetaData.author: Super-Colliding Super Button
ModMetaData.description:
Rim of Madness - Bones/ ===Enchantment===
Sprinkle some fairy dust onto some of the gfx
Enchants the following *Things*: * Bones * Bonecrete * Calcium Polymer * Bone China * Bone Marrow
For each material the buildings and items have a matching color.
Misc stuff: * Renames "Bone Ash" in some instances into "Bone China" since both refer to the same material.
